item.title: Report E-2025040036
item.description:
Report E-2025040036

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-06T01:06:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-31
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On March 31, 2025, one (1) 275-gallon tote of sodium nitrate had a loose lid and released approximately eight (8) ounces of product to the top of the tote. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from GrayMar Environmental Services (GES) to remediate the site. Crews attempted to removed the product from the tote, but were unsuccessful and recommended a tote transfer. Per R+L Safety's request, no transfer will be made until approval is received from the shipper (Univar Solutions). Crews labeled the tote with a "Do Not Ship" label, and demobilized.
